Thanks for your feedback! The dashboard does have a bit of a looser definition of fraud. When making real-time decisions using the API, we would recommend using 90+ as the threshold for high confidence decisions when blocking or penalizing a user based on the Fraud Score. You can also use 85+ as a threshold on the API, but we recommend starting with 90+ and then adjusting the score from there based on the results you are seeing.

query: Red Canary - Upgrade to Premium / Subuser Request
response: To get added as a subaccount for Red Canary, we'll start by asking them for the security code of the Red Canary main account, then go from there. Happy to help! I just need to get the security code of the Red Canary main account, then I can get you upgraded.
